text:
Company: Gonzales-Palmer

Role: Paralegal 

Company Background: 
Gonzales-Palmer is a leading law firm committed to providing exceptional legal services. Our team thrives on mutual respect and inclusivity, fostering a diverse and supportive work environment.

Job Type: Full-Time

Job Description:
We are seeking a diligent and organized Paralegal to join our team. The ideal candidate will assist attorneys with case preparation, document management, and legal research. 

Responsibilities:
- Conduct legal research and draft documents.
- Manage case files and maintain up-to-date records.
- Assist attorneys in preparing for trials and hearings.
- Coordinate with clients and other stakeholders.
- Perform administrative tasks as needed.

Qualifications and Experience Needed:
- Bachelor’s degree or paralegal certification.
- 2+ years of experience in a paralegal role preferred.
- Strong research and analytical skills.
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
- Proficiency with legal research databases and case management software.

Perks and Benefits:
- We are committed to fair and equitable pay practices. The salary for this position ranges from $50,000 to $70,000, based on your experience and skills.
- Comprehensive healthcare coverage.
- Generous paid time off and parental leave.
- Professional development opportunities.
- Inclusive and diverse workplace culture.

Application Process:
Candidates from all backgrounds are welcome to apply. We prioritize creating a culture where everyone feels respected and included. Please submit your resume and cover letter through our online portal.
